22.body: actively occupy a people and oppress them for political gain. This joke would be based on Israel committing war crimes against the Palestinian People. And probably against their own citizens as well.

22.author: SuckmyBlunt545
22.body: actively occupy a people and oppress them for political gain. This joke would be based on Israel committing war crimes against the Palestinian People. And probably against their own citizens as well. It’s the world longest ongoing military occupation but when Palestinians throw rocks against the most advanced armoured tanks Israel and the west cry terrorism. It’s disgustingly one sided narrative that gets pushed but the truth is slowly coming up. Not that the actual situation there is getting better Israel is worse than ever. Palestine is ruled by a dickwad of a leader who fights to keep his power.

22.author: SuckmyBlunt545
22.body: The one side got the 3d most advanced military in the world, the others got firecrackers.

22.author: AssPuncher9000
22.body:
Murder is still murder, doesn't matter if it's with a gun or a spoon. 

But for the record I completely agree that the USA should not be providing military tech or funding to a country that uses it to attack civilians.

22.author: SuckmyBlunt545
22.body: I agree murder is wrong and wish death on no one. However, when you oppress people to the point of no outlook or hope, you push them to extreme measures. Imagine you live under military occupation and are actively oppressed everyday and see people you love killed or jailed for the sole purpose of power. It would likely not seem unreasonable to fight back using violence. Therefor the argument “it’s two sided” is silly when one has a gun and the other a stick. The notions that Israel does not have total control is insane, it has the 3d most powerful military in THE WORLD. Unfortunately main stream media is quick to point out a stabbing commuted by a Palestinian, but fails to present the ongoing struggle of a nation and its ppl under occupation. It’s a terrible desperate situation. Do not be fooled it is religious at hard, it’s political to the very end, and the west is happy to comply with a military power at its disposal in the Middle East, even at the cost of ongoing instability in the entire region.
